cta_whatsapp_message: Hello, I am interested in Marriott Residences JLT. Please contact me.
project_info_title: Grand Lakeside Living in Jumeirah Lake Towers
project_info_text:
Marriott Residences JLT by Saba Properties introduces branded residential living in the heart of Jumeirah Lake Towers. Rising 51 storeys above the community, the tower offers refined 1, 2, and 3-bedroom apartments designed with premium finishes and spacious layouts.

Overlooking the serene lakes of JLT, the development blends contemporary architecture with the reliability of the Marriott brand, creating an address that appeals to both end-users and long-term investors seeking strong rental demand in a central Dubai location.
amenities_title: Amenities and spaces designed for refined living
project_summary_subtitle: Modern lakefront living with global standards
map_text: Located in Jumeirah Lake Towers, Marriott Residences JLT enjoys direct access to Sheikh Zayed Road and close proximity to Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, and Downtown Dubai. The community offers waterfront promenades, retail, dining, and metro connectivity, making it one of Dubaiâ€™s most established residential hubs.
footer_tagline: Branded lakefront apartments in Jumeirah Lake Towers
